```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r }
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  glimpse
```

```{r vis_life_v_gdp_bad}
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  filter(
    year == 2007,
    continent != "FSU"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(continent, gdpPercap)) +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = pop, fill = lifeExp),
    pch = 21
  ) +
  viridis::scale_fill_viridis(name = "Life Expectancy at Birth") +
  scale_size_continuous(
    name = "Population",
    range = c(3, 20),
    breaks = c(1e5, 1e7, 1e9)
  )+
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.box = "vertical"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Continent",
    y = "GDP / Capita (US $, Inflation-adjusted)",
    subtitle = "In 2007",
    caption = "Data from Gapminder"
  )
ggsave("../../fig/03_gapminder_bad.png")
```

```{r vis_life_v_gdp_standard}
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  filter(
    year == 2007,
    continent != "FSU"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(gdpPercap, lifeExp)) +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = pop, fill = continent),
    pch = 21
  ) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_size_continuous(
    name = "Population",
    range = c(3, 20),
    breaks = c(1e5, 1e7, 1e9)
  )+
  scale_fill_discrete(name = "Continent") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.box = "vertical"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "GDP / Capita (US $, Inflation-adjusted)",
    y = "Life Expectancy at birth (Years)",
    subtitle = "In 2007",
    caption = "Data from Gapminder"
  )
ggsave("../../fig/03_gapminder_standard.png")
```
